notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: debate on nature versus nurture
two positions:
nature position (character and behavior influenced by genetic inheritance)
nurture position (character and behavior influenced by environment)
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: intelligence tests, which are one area where the nature versus nurture debate exists
nature and nurture positions on intelligence tests:
nature position = intelligence test scores based on genetic inheritance from parents (experience and learning have little to do with them)
nurture position = intelligence test scores based on experience and learning since birth (genetic inheritance has little to do with them)

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the reading passage.
I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
